title: Accenture, TCS, Infosys rise in brand value among IT firms, Wipro dips
description: With generative large language models obtaining a lot of attention now, Brand Finance research suggests that Accenture is well poised to embrace the mega-trend that offers the possibility of reinventing businesses and industries.
content: IT services firms Accenture, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and Infosys continued to boost their brand value despite tepid growth environment and the disruption owing to newer technologies.
cleaned_content: it services firms accenture tata consultancy services tcs and infosys continued to boost their brand value despite tepid growth environment and the disruption owing to newer technologies
